message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to negotiate.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Don't forget, the value decreases with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%. Let's meet in the middle at a 55/45 split. This is my final offer before the value drops even further.
